content.text:
# Analysis of the Main Target Image

The target structure consists of two separate constructions:

## Left Construction:
- Total blocks: 5
- Layers: 3
- Base: Horizontal green rectangular block
- Middle: Orange cylindrical block placed vertically
- Top: Green U-shaped structure made of 3 blocks (2 vertical rectangles with 1 horizontal connecting them)

## Right Construction:
- Total blocks: 5
- Layers: 3
- Base: Two orange cylindrical blocks placed vertically
- Middle: Two yellow rectangular blocks forming a cross pattern across the cylinders
- Top: One orange cylindrical block on the left pillar with an orange triangular roof piece at the very top

# Required Blocks from Dictionary

From analyzing the image, I need the following blocks:

- Block 1: Green horizontal rectangle (for the base of left structure)
- Block 2: Green vertical rectangle (for left side of U-shape)
- Block 3: Green vertical rectangle (for right side of U-shape)
- Block 4: Green horizontal rectangle (for connecting piece of U-shape)
- Block 6 or 7: Yellow horizontal rectangle (for one cross piece)
- Block 10 or 11: Yellow horizontal rectangle (for second cross piece)
- Block 12: Orange cylinder (needed 4 times - 1 for left structure, 2 for right base, 1 for top of right)
- Block 14: Orange triangular roof piece (for the very top)

# Assembly Order

```
{
    Step1: Move block with index 1
    Step2: Move block with index 12
    Step3: Move block with index 2
    Step4: Move block with index 3
    Step5: Move block with index 4
    Step6: Move block with index 12
    Step7: Move block with index 12
    Step8: Move block with index 6
    Step9: Move block with index 10
    Step10: Move block with index 12
    Step11: Move block with index 14
}
```
